item.title: Critic’s Notebook: A Flat Nate Bargatze and a Lame Time-Saving Gag Upstage Worthy Winners at the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards
item.description: The Boys & Girls Clubs of America had a roller-coaster night as ‘The Pitt,’ ‘The Studio’ and ‘Adolescence’ dominated.

item.title: ‘Good Boy’ Review: Stephen Graham and Andrea Riseborough Lead an Intriguingly Odd but Frustratingly Empty Fable
item.description: Premiering at TIFF, the latest from Jan Komasa (‘Corpus Christi’) follows a family man who kidnaps and imprisons a troublemaking stranger, with plans to rehabilitate him.

item.title: ‘Good Boy’ Review: Stephen Graham and Andrea Riseborough Lead an Intriguingly Odd but Frustratingly Empty Fable
item.description: Premiering at TIFF, the latest from Jan Komasa (‘Corpus Christi’) follows a family man who kidnaps and imprisons a troublemaking stranger, with plans to rehabilitate him.

item.title: ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere’ Review: Jeremy Allen White Gives Raw, Internalized Performance as The Boss in Contemplative Bio-Drama
item.description: Jeremy Strong, Stephen Graham and Odessa Young also star in Scott Cooper’s examination of the brutal comedown after a blockbuster tour, which yielded the musician’s most personal album.

item.title: Jeremy Allen White’s Bruce Springsteen Movie ‘Deliver Me From Nowhere’ to Open AFI Fest
item.description: The film, from auteur Scott Cooper and 20th Century Studios, will help unspool the 39th edition of the Los Angeles film festival presented by Canva.
